==========
catbox-api
==========


    A Python wrapper for the Catbox.moe API.

    Usage example: https://github.com/andrei-cb/catbox_api/blob/master/tests/tests.py

.. _pyscaffold-notes:

Note
====

information on PyScaffold see https://pyscaffold.org/.
